name: hrevert/ht-settings-module
description: Flexible Settings module for Zend Framework 2 applications

suggest.league/flysystem: If you want to use xml/json storage adapters provided by this module
suggest.zendframework/zend-cache: if you want to cache settings
suggest.zendframework/zend-json: If you want to use json storage adapter
suggest.zendframework/zend-modulemanager: To use it as a Zend Framework 2 module
suggest.zendframework/zend-mvc: To use with Zend Framework 2 MVC
suggest.zf-commons/zfc-base: if you want to use Zend\Db for settings persistence
